profile: Restoremax provides 24 hour emergency service for flood and fire restoration. We offer direct insurance billing. All our technicians are IICRC trained to ensure our restoration services meet high industry standards.

profile: Since 1962 Bachly Construction has become an industry leader in Property Damage Emergency & Disaster Restoration.   We are a Full Service 24/7/365 operation.  We provide free quotes! We have the Knowledge, Experience and Expertise to handle all property damage situations.  Water, fire, smoke, wind,  mould, asbestos, break and enters, vehicle impact, trauma/decontamination, environmental and much more!   Contact our emergency line 1 800 363 3473 to speak to a live technician on call 24/7!  Bachly Construction also has an award winning Custom Home Construction Division as well as a Custom Cottage and Commercial Construction Division.  We encourage you to visit our website www.bachly.com
service_area: We Provide Property Emergency And Restoration Services Across Southern Ontario. Call us now 1 800 363 3473 for a free ...
hours: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
products: All of our Project Manager and Technicians are Institute of Inspection Cleaning and Restoration Certification (IICRC) and Restoration Industry Association (RIA) certified.  These certifications are designed to teach our staff how to properly mitigate and reduce the potential for further damage incurred from the loss.
services:
ALL PROPERTY DAMAGE - We Work With All Insurance Companies - 
Water Damage,
Fire Damage,
Smoke Damage,
Wind Damage,
Ice Damage,
Tree Damage,
Mould Remediation,
Asbestos Remediation,
Oil Spill Remediation,
Other Environmental Disasters,
Break and Enter Damage,

Crime and Trauma, 
Decontamination and Bio-Hazard.
brands: We use all energy efficient drying and mitigation equipment
specialities:
Water Damage - Basement Floods, Sewer Back-ups, Water main ruptures, Burst Pipes, Ice Damming, Toilet Over flows, Burst Water Softener, etc.
Fire - All Types, Smoke Damage, Contents Cleaning, Board ups, Odour Control.
Mold/Mould - Full remediation, inspections
Asbestos - Full remediation, inspections
